text:
Hi guys! I want to work with a static size array of structs inside a function. How should I do that?
```function test(...)
  points = SVector{4,Point2D{Float64}}(Point2D(0., 0.), Point2D(0., 0.), Point2D(0., 0.), Point2D(0., 0.))
  ...
end```
Is this the correct approach?

elements.text: Hi guys! I want to work with a static size array of structs inside a function. How should I do that?

text:
I thought you can use the macro to make life easier?
```@SVector [Point2D(0., 0.), Point2D(0., 0.), Point2D(0., 0.), Point2D(0., 0.)]```
